item.title: Help with a server restarter
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im trying to make a restarter but all i can do is open up a bat >.<

[code]import java.io.;
import java.awt.;

public class serverRestarter {

public void restart() {
    Desktop d = Desktop.getDesktop();

    try {
    server.clientListener.close();
        d.open(new File("Server Restart.bat"));
    } catch (Exception e) {
	System.out.println("cant find bat");
	System.exit( 0 );
}

}

}
[/code]

i cant figure out how to close the other batch file so only one runs and it doesnt say error port already in use
any ideas?

or am i going totaly the wrong way in making one
